makerbit.connectSerialMp3: Connects to serial MP3 device with chip YX5300.
makerbit.connectSerialMp3|param|mp3RX: MP3 device receiver pin (RX), eg: DigitalPin.P0
makerbit.connectSerialMp3|param|mp3TX: MP3 device transmitter pin (TX), eg: DigitalPin.P1
makerbit.mp3Folder: Returns the index of the selected MP3 folder.
makerbit.mp3Track:
Returns the index of the last MP3 track event.
It could be either a track started or completed event.
This block intended to be used inside of track event handlers.
makerbit.onMp3TrackCompleted: Do something when a MP3 track is completed.
makerbit.onMp3TrackCompleted|param|handl: body code to run when event is raised
makerbit.onMp3TrackStarted: Do something when a MP3 track is started.
makerbit.onMp3TrackStarted|param|handler: body code to run when event is raised
makerbit.playMp3Folder: Plays all tracks in a folder.
makerbit.playMp3Folder|param|repeat: indicates whether to repeat the folder, eg: Mp3Repeat.No
makerbit.playMp3TrackFromFolder: Plays a track from a folder.
makerbit.playMp3TrackFromFolder|param|re: indicates whether to repeat the track, eg: Mp3Repeat.No
makerbit.runMp3Command: Dispatches a command to the MP3 device.
makerbit.setMp3Volume|param|volume: volume in the range of 0 to 30: eg: 30
